seed_pair.known: But I don't want to stop talking.
seed_pair.target: Pero no quiero parar de hablar.

curation_metadata.curated_by: Claude Code - Phase 5 v3.0 STRICT GATE compliance
curation_metadata.gate_compliance_note: Regenerated with strict GATE compliance - only exact Spanish forms taught in LEGOs through S0018

practice_phrases: I speak Spanish but you speak very well
hablo español pero hablas muy bien
I want to speak but I can't
he wants to come back but she wants to find out
él quiere volver pero ella quiere descubrir
I can speak today but I want to speak tomorrow
puedo hablar hoy pero quiero hablar mañana
we want to meet at six o'clock but I want to meet later on
queremos reunirnos a las seis pero quiero reunirnos más tarde
I speak very well but I'm not sure if you speak
hablo muy bien pero no estoy seguro si hablas
she wants to meet this evening but he wants to come back tomorrow
ella quiere reunirnos esta noche pero él quiere volver mañana
I can speak Spanish but I want to be able to speak very well
puedo hablar español pero quiero poder hablar muy bien
S0019L01.full_seed_included: NO - missing 'I don't want' and 'to stop talking'
S0019L01.gate_compliance: STRICT - Only S0001-S0018 LEGOs available. Third conjunction 'pero' now available with 'si' and 'y'
S0019L01.note: Third conjunction now available - can use with 'si' and 'y'. 'no puedo' uses both 'no' and 'puedo' from whitelist.

practice_phrases: I don't want to speak Spanish
I don't want to come back
I don't want to meet tomorrow
I speak but I don't want to speak
I don't want to find out what the answer is
no quiero descubrir cuál es la respuesta
he wants to speak but I don't want to speak
él quiere hablar pero no quiero hablar
I don't want to meet at six o'clock this evening
no quiero reunirnos a las seis esta noche
I don't want to stop talking
I don't want to stop talking tomorrow
no quiero parar de hablar mañana
I speak but I don't want to stop talking
hablo pero no quiero parar de hablar
he wants to stop talking but I don't want to stop talking
él quiere parar de hablar pero no quiero parar de hablar
I want to speak at six o'clock but I don't want to stop talking
quiero hablar a las seis pero no quiero parar de hablar
but I don't want to stop talking.
pero no quiero parar de hablar.
